sentences.en: Cut Throat : Where in the World is Bobby De Salvo?
sentences.cn: 刎颈: 世界上哪里是警察的条款?

sentences.en: His testimony, however, was only one in a salvo of new attacks.
sentences.cn: 然而他的证词只是新一轮唇枪舌剑中的一股火力。

sentences.en: Low target accuracy is compensated or with several missiles per salvo.
sentences.cn: 这补偿了它射击精度低和一次齐射只能发射几枚火箭弹的不足.

sentences.en: The performance won a salvo of applause.
There was a salvo of approval.
sentences.cn: 突然爆出一阵赞同的齐声喝彩.

sentences.en: They were to fire a salvo of blanks, after the national anthem.
sentences.cn: 国歌过后，他们将齐射一阵空包弹。

words.tran_cn: 齐射；[军]齐鸣；齐声欢呼喝彩；保留条款；遁辞

trans.tran_cn: （炮火）齐射，（礼炮）齐鸣，齐声欢呼喝彩，[法]保留条款，遁词
trans.tran_en: when several guns are fired during a battle or as part of a ceremony
